verses.verse: Moreover, David <S%H1732><s%> and the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> set <S%H914><s%> apart <S%H914><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> [some] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%> and of Heman <S%H1968><s%> and of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> who [were] to prophesy <S%H5012><s%> with lyres, <S%H3658><s%> harps, <S%H5035><s%> and cymbals; <S%H4700><s%> and the number <S%H4557><s%> of those <S%H376><s%> who performed <S%H4399><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> was:

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph: <S%H623><s%> Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> and Asharelah; <S%H841><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%> [were] under <S%H5921><s%> the direction <S%H3027><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> who prophesied <S%H5012><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> the direction <S%H3027><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%>

Of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun: <S%H3038><s%> Gedaliah, <S%H9072><s%> Zeri, <S%H6874><s%> Jeshaiah, <S%H9198><s%> Shimei, Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> and Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> six, <S%H8337><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> the direction <S%H3027><s%> of their father Jeduthun <S%H1><s%> with the harp, <S%H3038><s%> who prophesied <S%H3658><s%> in giving <S%H5012><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> and praising <S%H3034><s%> the Lord. <S%H1984><s%>

Of Heman, <S%H1968><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heman: <S%H1968><s%> Bukkiah, <S%H1232><s%> Mattaniah, <S%H4983><s%> Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> Shebuel <S%H7619><s%> and Jerimoth, <S%H3406><s%> Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> Eliathah, <S%H448><s%> Giddalti <S%H1437><s%> and Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, <S%H3436><s%> Mallothi, <S%H4413><s%> Hothir, <S%H1956><s%> Mahazioth. <S%H4238><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heman <S%H1968><s%> the king's seer <S%H2374><s%> to exalt <S%H7311><s%> him according to the words <S%H1697><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> to Heman. <S%H1968><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were under <S%H5921><s%> the direction <S%H3027><s%> of their father to sing <S%H1><s%> in the house <S%H7892><s%> of the Lord, <S%H1004><s%> with cymbals, <S%H3068><s%> harps <S%H4700><s%> and lyres, <S%H5035><s%> for the service <S%H3658><s%> of the house <S%H5656><s%> of God. <S%H1004><s%> Asaph, <S%H430><s%> Jeduthun <S%H623><s%> and Heman <S%H3038><s%> [were] under <S%H1968><s%> the direction <S%H5921><s%> of the king. <S%H3027><s%>

And their number <S%H4557><s%> who were trained <S%H3925><s%> in singing <S%H7892><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> with their relatives, <S%H251><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who were skillful, <S%H995><s%> [was] 288.

And they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for their duties, <S%H4931><s%> all <S%H5980><s%> alike, <S%H5980><s%> the small <S%H9512><s%> as well as the great, <S%H1419><s%> the teacher <S%H995><s%> [as well] as the pupil. <S%H8527><s%>

Now the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for Asaph <S%H623><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> for Gedaliah, <S%H9072><s%> he with his relatives <S%H251><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%> [were] twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the third <S%H7992><s%> to Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the fourth <S%H7243><s%> to Izri, <S%H3339><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the sixth <S%H8345><s%> to Bukkiah, <S%H1232><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the seventh <S%H7637><s%> to Jesharelah, <S%H3480><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the eighth <S%H8066><s%> to Jeshaiah, <S%H9198><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the ninth <S%H8671><s%> to Mattaniah, <S%H4983><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the tenth <S%H6224><s%> to Shimei, <S%H8096><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Azarel, <S%H5832><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the thirteenth, <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> Shubael, <S%H7619><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the fourteenth, <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Jeremoth, <S%H3406><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the sixteenth <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Joshbekashah, <S%H3436><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the eighteenth <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the nineteenth <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> to Mallothi, <S%H4413><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Eliathah, <S%H448><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the twenty-first to Hothir, <S%H1956><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the twenty-second to Giddalti, <S%H1437><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the twenty-third to Mahazioth, <S%H4238><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%>; <S%H6240><s%>
for the twenty-fourth to Romamti-ezer, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> twelve. <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>
